EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-10-Charlotte Community Appreciation.ES-2017-09-28-Invite-2.ES-2017-0
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Charlotte Community Appreciation TopGolf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/charlotte-community-appreciation-topgolf/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on October 10th, at TopGolf Charlotte. Join Turbonomic and Dynamix for an exciting evening of food drinks and golf. You'll casually learn about our product roadmap from current Turbonomic and Dynamix customers. We hope you will accept this invitation, learn more about our technology, and network with your peers in the industry. TopGolf Charlotte <[[https://turbonomic.com/charlotte-community-appreciation-topgolf/]]>
8024 Savoy Corporate Drive, Charlotte, NC 28273 Tuesday, October 10th 5:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/charlotte-community-appreciation-topgolf/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
